historical_background_zh: 与1851年大博览会密切相关；亨利·科尔等改革者通过博物馆展示与批评机制，推动工业时代的设计标准与公共审美改良。 与A.W.N.普金的哥特复兴理论相关，他将中世纪建筑与装饰视为对工业时代折衷审美的道德性替代方案。 风格语境：Industrial Design。 地域语境：France / Britain。
historical_background_en: Closely tied to the Great Exhibition (1851), where reformers such as Henry Cole used museum display and criticism to improve public taste and design standards under industrial production. Linked to A.W.N. Pugin's Gothic Revival theory, which framed medieval architecture and ornament as morally grounded alternatives to eclectic industrial-era taste. Style context: Industrial Design. Regional context: France / Britain.
